mapper.update: UPDATE "MEMBER" SET MEMBER_NAME = #{memberName}, MEMBER_PHONE = #{memberPhone}, PROFILE_IMG = #{profileImg}, UPDATE_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo}
UPDATE "MEMBER" SET MEMBER_PW = #{encPw}, UPDATE_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo}
UPDATE "MEMBER" SET MEMBER_DEL_FL = 'Y', UPDATE_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo}
mapper.select: SELECT MEMBER_NO, MEMBER_ID, MEMBER_NAME, MEMBER_PW, AUTHORITY, PROFILE_IMG, ENROLL_DATE, MEMBER_PHONE FROM "MEMBER" WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{memberId} AND MEMBER_DEL_FL = 'N'

SELECT A.POST_NO, A.CATEGORY, A.POST_TITLE, A.CONTENT, B.MEMBER_NAME AS "reporterName", C.REPORT_REASON,
CASE WHEN SYSDATE - CAST(C.REPORT_DATE AS DATE) < 1 / 24 / 60 THEN FLOOR((SYSDATE - CAST(C.REPORT_DATE AS DATE)) * 24 * 60 * 60) || '초 전'
WHEN SYSDATE - CAST(C.REPORT_DATE AS DATE) < 1 / 24 THEN FLOOR((SYSDATE - CAST(C.REPORT_DATE AS DATE)) * 24 * 60) || '분 전'
WHEN SYSDATE - CAST(C.REPORT_DATE AS DATE) < 1 THEN FLOOR((SYSDATE - CAST(C.REPORT_DATE AS DATE)) * 24) || '시간 전'
ELSE TO_CHAR(C.REPORT_DATE, 'YYYY.MM.DD') END REPORT_DATE
FROM POST A JOIN REPORT C ON A.POST_NO = C.POST_NO JOIN MEMBER B ON C.MEMBER_NO = B.MEMBER_NO WHERE A.POST_NO IN (SELECT POST_NO FROM REPORT) AND A.POST_DELETE = 'N' ORDER BY C.REPORT_DATE DESC
